ProductInfo.Features:
H.264 DCCS DVR USB Mouse Control with GUI Display
Compatible with many popular mobile platforms, such as iPhone, BlackBerry, Windows Mobile, Symbian & Android
1/2.5" super low illumination Aptina Sensor Made in USA 700 TVL CCD Cameras
Definable "Resolution" / "Quality" / "IPS" by channels at your preferences to increase the recording efficiency, and avoid any important scenes to be missed.
Channel switching is independent from the local site, allowing users to have private image monitoring remotely.
ProductInfo.Name: Evertech 16 Channel Surveillance Security H.264 STAND ALONE EAGLE EYE REAL-TIME CCTV DVR Camera System with 16 Dome 700 TVL 2.8mm Lens CCD Cameras-1TB HDD-LCD Monitor
